query:
SELECT 
  ta.id,
  ta.accountNumber,
  ta.broker,
  ta.status,
  ta.lastHeartbeat,
  ta.openPositions,
  u.email,
  TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, ta.lastHeartbeat, NOW()) as seconds_ago
FROM trading_accounts ta
JOIN users u ON ta.userId = u.id
WHERE u.email = 'adm1@sentra.com'
ORDER BY ta.lastHeartbeat DESC;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 33ExLKejDoGAsBq.root --database U7PERJfz8y27QdzUYcBk8J --execute SELECT 
  ta.id,
  ta.accountNumber,
  ta.broker,
  ta.status,
  ta.lastHeartbeat,
  ta.openPositions,
  u.email,
  TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, ta.lastHeartbeat, NOW()) as seconds_ago
FROM trading_accounts ta
JOIN users u ON ta.userId = u.id
WHERE u.email = 'adm1@sentra.com'
ORDER BY ta.lastHeartbeat DESC;
